Plot: This is the story of the search for the secret of lasting love. Newlyweds, Mike and Alanna drove a motorbike down the panamerican highway, interviewing 120 couples along the way.
Title: Going the Distance: A Honeymoon Adventure
Country: UK, Argentina, Bolivia, Canada, Colombia, Costa Rica, Ecuador, Guatemala, Mexico, Nicaragua, Panama, Peru, USA
Director: Mike Clear, Alanna Clear, Paul Watson
